title: Reflection - incident ray 30 degrees from surface

content.question: A laser beam is directed toward a vertical flat mirror at an angle of <math alttext="30 degrees" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>30</mn><mo>°</mo></math> from the mirror’s surface, as shown in the figure. What is the angle of reflection as measured between the normal to the mirror's surface and the reflected beam?
